input.description: adapter name [Optional] The name of the adapter that is enabled on the Peer. The default adapter name is HPSEActor

1. Creates a storage pool with the specified unconfigured pools, storage setting and size. Sample Request XML:
<items> <item> <command>create</command> <category>pool</category> <process-id>create-storage-pool</process-id> <command-arguments> <size>10</size> <storage-setting-id>1011</storage-setting-id> <pool-ids>1001</pool-ids> </command-arguments> </item> </items>
Parameters Description:
command[Required] The actual command type that will be executed. category[Required] This parameter identifies the top-level functional category. process-id[Required] Unique identifier for the process workflow. pool-ids[Required] space-separated list of ids of unconfigured pools. size[Required] <size in MB> is the size of the pool in megabytes. storage-setting-id[Optional] the storage setting ID for the new pool.
2. Creates a storage pool with the specified unconfigured pools, storage setting, extent and size Sample Request XML:
<items> <item> <command>create</command> <category>pool</category> <process-id>create-storage-pool</process-id> <command-arguments> <size>10</size> <storage-setting-id>1011</storage-setting-id> <extent-id>1021</extent-id> <pool-ids>1001</pool-ids> </command-arguments> </item> </items>
Parameters Description:
command[Required] The actual command type that will be executed. category[Required] This parameter identifies the top-level functional category. process-id[Required] Unique identifier for the process workflow. pool-ids[Required] space-separated list of ids of unconfigured pools. size[Required] <size in MB> is the size of the pool in megabytes. storage-setting-id[Optional] the storage setting ID for the new pool. extent-id[Optional] The extent identifier. This command currently supports only one extent identifier.
